page.title: 13CHILDREN'S LEISURE
page.content: When{school}is over many of us go to local{clubs}in the evening and at weekends. Some girls belong to the 7th and 3rd Keighley{Brownies}and several boys go to the 19th Keighley {Cubs.} There is a well attended {swimming club}at{Keighley Baths}and some boys enjoy training at the{Trevor {Hockey Soccer Club}every Sunday morning. One of our class is a member of{Branshaw Junior Golf Club}and many Ingrow children attend the{Caravanners which is a youth club run by the local {Nazarene Church. There is also a{Leisure Centre}in {Victoria Park}across town, and we can play most indoor sports there, such as {table- tennis, badminton}and{squash.
